question: 3 (a)
sols_html:
Using the power rule with \(n=6\).

\[\begin{aligned} f'(x)&= 6x^5.\end{aligned}\]
statement_html:
Let \(\displaystyle f(x) = x^{6}\)

What is the derivative of \(f(x)\)?
statement_latex:
Let $\displaystyle f(x) = x^{6}$

What is the derivative of $f(x)$?
statement_raw:
Let <math> \displaystyle f(x) = x^{6} </math>

What is the derivative of <math>f(x)</math>?
